title: Liftings and invariant subspaces of Hankel operators
authors: Sneha B, Neeru Bala, Samir Panja, and Jaydeb Sarkar
abstract:
We prove a Hankel-variant commutant lifting theorem. This also uncovers the
complete structure of the Beurling-type reducing and invariant subspaces of
Hankel operators. Kernel spaces of Hankel operators play a key role in the
analysis.
